email.subject: 7 DAY REMINDER TO RENEW OR CLOSE - __id8ID__ - __protocolTitle__
email.body:
PI:__piName__
Protocol Number:__id8ID__
Protocol Title:__protocolTitle__
Action Required:7 DAY REMINDER TO RENEW OR CLOSE
This is a reminder that IRB approval for the above protocol will expire IN ONE WEEK on __rulesField1__.
ACTION REQUIRED
Protocol Renewal:
If you wish to continue your project beyond this expiry date, you must submit a completed Continuing Review Form to our office a minimum of two weeks before the expiry date. Failure to submit the form prior to expiration will result in suspension of your study related activities.
Protocol Closure:
If your study has concluded, please complete the Final Report Form prior to the expiration date.
Please contact the IRB Office if you have any questions: hsrpp@mavq.com
NOTE: A reminder will be received until a Continuing Review or Final Report has been Approved/Acknowledged.
Please login to the __url__ to access any task or view your Protocol. Please ensure you are using a supported browser; Chrome, Firefox or Microsoft Edge.

email.subject: EXPIRATION NOTIFICATION- PLEASE RENEW OR CLOSE - __id8ID__ - __protocolTitle__
email.body:
PI:__piName__
Protocol Number:__id8ID__
Protocol Title:__protocolTitle__
Action Required:EXPIRATION NOTIFICATION - PLEASE RENEW OR CLOSE
The IRB protocol above EXPIRED on __rulesField1__.
All study related research activity must cease until new approval is granted. Activity includes all advertising, recruitment, screening, enrollment of new study participants, continued data collection, and any communication with participants.
ACTION REQUIRED
Protocol Renewal:
If you wish to continue your project beyond this expiry date, you must submit a completed Continuing Review Form to our office as soon as possible. Failure to submit the form will result in TERMINATION of your study related activities in 180 days.
Protocol Closure:
If your study has concluded, please complete the Final Report Form as soon as possible. Failure to submit this form will prevent you from applying for new IRB Initial Application or Amendment to an active protocol until this project is closed.
Please contact the IRB Office if you have any questions: hsrpp@mavq.com
Please login to the __url__ to access any task or view your Protocol. Please ensure you are using a supported browser; Chrome, Firefox or Microsoft Edge.

email.subject: TERMINATED NOTIFICATION - __id8ID__ - __protocolTitle__
email.body:
PI:__piName__
Protocol Number:__id8ID__
Protocol Title:__protocolTitle__
Action Required:TERMINATED NOTIFICATION
The IRB protocol above EXPIRED on __rulesField1__ and we have not heard from you.
Therefore, we have TERMINATED this study. At this time, you no longer have IRB coverage and if you want to continue this research, you will have to submit an entire new application to the IRB. All study related research activity must cease until new approval is granted. Activity includes all advertising, recruitment, screening, enrollment of new study participants, continued data collection or analysis, and any communication with participants.
ACTION REQUIRED
Protocol Termination:
Please complete the Final Report Form as soon as possible. Failure to submit this form will prevent you from applying for new IRB Initial Applications until this project is closed.
Please contact the IRB Office if you have any questions: hsrpp@mavq.com
Please login to the __url__ to access any task or view your Protocol. Please ensure you are using a supported browser; Chrome, Firefox or Microsoft Edge.
